name: Ducky Bouncy
description:
One day, Cotton was swimming in the river when a lonely little duckling swam by. Realizing that the duckling had come from the top of the waterfall, Cotton welcomed the duckling into her arms and set off on an adventure to bring the chick back to his family.

Obstacles such as tall trees, high mountains, and misty clouds won't be easy to overcome, but they'll guide you to the right destination.

A mysterious bubble will protect you from many difficulties and help you jump higher and higher!

Have a wonderful time with Cotton and his friend in this charming video game, where you'll explore beautiful places and help your friend find his family.
